info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 1:19PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN EDDY COUNTY THROUGH 145 PM MDT... At 118 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Malaga, or 15 miles southeast of Carlsbad, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Loving and Malaga. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.
